snippet.title: Special Abilities Showcase - Everblade DevLog
snippet.description:
Everblade offers a number of special attacks and other abilities. Here, we'll show you how they work.

PLAY THE DEMO:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1873570/Everblade/

FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL MEDIA:
